summary: EXPERIENCED ACCOUNTANT with more than 15 years of accounting and financial analysis experience. Expertise in budgeting and economic analysis, financial reporting, and resource analysis/optimization. Solid record of performance managing analytical studies, key initiatives, and high- profile performance improvement projects. Technical expert and analyst on complex program issues. Solid critical thinking, problem-solving, research and liaison skills. Recognized for outstanding communication skills, flexibility, keen political savvy, sense of humor, and leadership abilities.

experience.title: Staff Accountant
experience.description: Analyzed financial reports and programs to resolve problems; prepared internal financial reports; monitored and researched revenue and budget variances; resolved complex issues involving multiple aspects of financial management; reviewed policies to plan and develop financial controls; performed reconciliations of accounts and transactions; updated monthly schedules for fixed assets; reconciled payroll tax withholdings; prepared monthly journal entries for fixed asset activity; advised senior management on financial-related issues; identified challenges and determined corrective actions; developed and maintained collaborative relationships; partnered with team members to establish streamlined financial and business strategies.

experience.title: Accounts Payable Representative
experience.description: Managed financial functions and coordinated daily accounting functions for a high-profile regional medical facility; formulated and implemented processes for reviewing recurring payments and processing invoices, vouchers, reimbursements and check requests; performed administrative support for payment documentation; led extensive business studies to identify and resolve payment challenges; conducted analyses to evaluate program effectiveness and determine options for problem resolution; partnered with procurement to resolve pricing and quantity issues; provided customer service to internal and external customers; communicated effectively with diverse stakeholders.
